bibl.title: Notes on the Social Structure of Late Antique Aphrodito.
bibl.note: "I summarize the categories of occupation, service, and rank found in the Aphrodito papyri of the sixth to eighth centuries, giving a figure for the number of persons known by name to be found in each occupation."

bibl.title: Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte

bibl.seg: MacCoull Leslie S.B., Notes on the Social Structure of Late Antique Aphrodito.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 26 (1984) pp. 65-77.

"I summarize the categories of occupation, service, and rank found in the Aphrodito papyri of the sixth to eighth centuries, giving a figure for the number of persons known by name to be found in each occupation."
